resources.string:
- full Android 4 support
- support for the new forum / for the new domain
- a more intuitive way of controlling the app
- easier operation
- new app icon
- added English language support\- new setup assistant
The thank you for the app goes to…
All trademarks referenced in this app are property of their rightful owners.

Our community began with the focus of modifying iPhone and iPad themes, but in the meantime we are also glad to help you if your Mac is not responding, the iPhone crashes all the time or you just don\'t know which headphones are the best for your iPhone. We always appreciate new users, so join us! The registration is free!

Nice to see you here!\nTo use all features of our app, please log in. If you\'re not registered yet, that\'s no problem. Just click next and we\'ll guide you through the registration. You\'re done in a minute - we\'ll promise!
We wish (furthermore) you a lot of fun with the app and our forum. We\'re always happy about feedback.
